column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Service is hit or miss; sometimes it's super polite/helpful
column2: other times the people taking my order make me feel like I'm holding up the line as I'm asking questions about the menu. It's a nice little sunny study spot on weekdays since it doesn't get too crowded at lunch
column3: but avoid it like the plague on weekends when the line is often out the door.
